title: Personalized Health Monitoring – Alerts for Abnormal Health Conditions
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to monitor my health and send alerts for any abnormal conditions so that I can manage my arthritis and any health issues effectively while remaining independent.

title: Automated Medication Reminders
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to send me automated medication reminders so that I can manage my arthritis pain effectively and remain active in my volunteering activities without worrying about forgetting my medications.

title: Voice-Activated Emergency Calls
summary: As an older adult, I want to use voice commands to make emergency calls so that I can quickly reach help without struggling with my physical limitations.

title: Wellness Activity Suggestions – Personalized Exercise Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want personalized exercise recommendations that consider my arthritis and mobility challenges so that I can stay physically active and engaged without risking injury.

title: Caregiver Access and Insights – Shared Health Data with Authorized Caregivers
summary: As an older adult, I want my authorized caregivers to easily access my health data so that they can support my recovery and ensure my well-being while respecting my privacy.

title: User-Centric Data Privacy Controls – User-Defined Data Sharing Preferences
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to have control over my data sharing preferences so that I can ensure my personal and health information is shared only with those I trust and for purposes I agree with.

title: Customizable Care Plans for Health Management
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to help me create and manage customizable care plans based on my health needs so that I can effectively monitor my arthritis and ensure I stay active and engaged in my community.

title: Family Communication Support – Facilitation of Family Group Messages
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to easily send and receive group messages with my family so that I can stay connected and updated on family activities despite my limited mobility.
